input_args.passage: 'The Lord of the Rings | The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel by the English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. Set in Middle-earth, the story began as a sequel to ...'
input_args.claim: "Tolkien, also known as John Ronald Reuel Tolkien, is an English writer and scholar who achieved fame with his children's book The Hobbit and his epic fantasy The Lord of the Rings."
